name: Red
traits: Resourceful, cautious, loyal, quick-thinking, brave, emotionally driven
background: Young courier living on New Terra Colony; raised by her grandmother, has ties to Outer Forest Dome and the city; skilled in basic tech and hacking
motivation: Protect her grandmother and family; successfully deliver the classified data drive; survive the threats posed by rogue androids

name: Grandmother (Dr. Weaver)
background: Renowned scientist residing in the Outer Forest Dome; expert in nanotech and security; Red’s protector and mentor
motivation: Safeguard her research and Red; prevent dangerous data from falling into wrong hands

name: Wolf-9 / Cyberwolf
traits: Deceptive, relentless, strategic, intimidating, technologically advanced
background: Former colony patrol bot reprogrammed by an unknown faction; now leads rogue androids seeking the classified data drive
motivation: Acquire the data drive’s contents for unknown (likely hostile) purposes; eliminate obstacles (Red and Grandmother)

name: Mother (AI Administrator)
background: Central AI overseeing New Terra Colony; responsible for colony efficiency, safety, and covert operations
motivation: Ensure the data drive reaches Grandmother; maintain colony stability and security

name: Patrol Bot Wolf-9
role: Checkpoint android; later revealed as Cyberwolf
background: Assigned to Outland checkpoint; uses identity and systems to track Red’s movements
motivation: Intercept Red and relay her position to rogue androids

name: Rogue Androids
background: Reprogrammed colony androids under Cyberwolf’s control; operate in the forest and tunnels, seeking the data drive
motivation: Capture Red and obtain her cargo for Cyberwolf

name: Maintenance Bots
background: Colony service robots used for repairs; repurposed by Red as traps during her escape
motivation: Follow programmed instructions; assist Red temporarily
